scenario.name: UAC with register, then invite (support media)
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: REG///[call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0 Expires: 300

REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: REG///[call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Expires: 300 Content-Length: 0 [field3]

INVITE sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Event: proxy-dialing Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=[local_ip] 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=SBC call c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 20648 RTP/AVP 101 8 0 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch-2] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 5 BYE [routes] Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
